categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Darv Eldon was captain of the Carrack-class light cruiser Vigilance under Admiral Winstel Greelanx, during the Battle of Nar Shaddaa. A close friend and classmate of Soontir Fel, Eldon died when the smuggler fleet ambushed the Vigilance amongst the debris field surrounding the moon.
